<h3 id="X38213">X(38213) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(8), X(10), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4-5*(b+c)*a^3+2*(b^2+5*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b+c)*(5*b^2-13*b*c+5*c^2)*a-4*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38213) = X(8)+2*X(6702) = 5*X(8)+X(26726) = 4*X(10)-X(214) = 5*X(10)-2*X(3035) = X(10)+2*X(3036) = 2*X(10)+X(15863) = 7*X(10)-X(33337) = X(11)+2*X(3626) = 5*X(214)-8*X(3035) = X(214)+8*X(3036) = X(214)+2*X(15863) = 7*X(214)-4*X(33337) = X(3035)+5*X(3036) = 4*X(3035)+5*X(15863) = 14*X(3035)-5*X(33337) = 4*X(3036)-X(15863) = 14*X(3036)+X(33337) = 10*X(6702)-X(26726) = 7*X(15863)+2*X(33337) = 5*X(16173)-X(26726)</b>
<p>X(38213) lies on these lines: {8,6702}, {10,140}, {11,3626}, {80,3617}, {100,17574}, {515,38128}, {516,38156}, {517,38141}, {518,38207}, {519,32557}, {528,38098}, {758,38215}, {993,34474}, {1145,4691}, {1317,3634}, {1320,4668}, {1387,3625}, {1484,9711}, {1698,12531}, {2800,5790}, {2801,38200}, {2802,3679}, {2829,38155}, {3244,6667}, {3632,31272}, {3697,17636}, {3814,23513}, {3828,11274}, {3878,11928}, {3918,11570}, {4002,17660}, {4662,6797}, {4669,5854}, {4701,25416}, {4745,17525}, {4973,5176}, {5123,38044}, {5587,18254}, {5690,6246}, {5840,38127}, {5844,38182}, {5846,38197}, {5847,38192}, {5848,38191}, {5850,38202}, {5851,38201}, {5853,38216}, {5855,38219}, {5856,38210}, {7972,9780}, {8256,38138}, {9710,11698}, {9956,25485}, {9963,31446}, {11729,31399}, {12735,19862}, {21154,28236}, {25440,37712}, {31145,32558}, {31235,33812}</p>
<p>
X(38213) = midpoint of X(8) and X(16173)<br>
X(38213) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (11274, 34123), (16173, 6702), (32557, 34122), (34123, 3828)<br>
X(38213) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (10, 3036, 15863), (10, 15863, 214), (10, 38176, 38214), (4701, 33709, 25416), (32557, 34122, 38104)<br>
</p>
